posts.post_content:
Same rules apply: I would prefer Paypal gift if possible. Shipping is 2 bucks and each additional is free. Let me know if you are interested!

T206 "Chief" Myers (Meyers) Batting Piedmont 350 fac. 25: $28 SOLD
T206 George Mullin Batting Sweet Caporal 350 fac. 30: $33
T206 Ed Killian Pitching Piedmont 150 fac. 25: $40
T206 Davy Jones ('s Locker) Red Portrait Sweet Caporal 350 fac. 30: $45
T206 Ed Killian Yellow Portrait Piedmont 350 fac. 25 (you can see the bottom of "Killian, Detroit" at the top of the card too): $50
T206 Claude Rossman Red Portrait Piedmont 350 fac. 25 (you can see the bottom half of "Rossman, Detroit" at the top of the card too): $250 OBO SOLD
